maqras.text: Ta, xi [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi]. Zhexie shi “gulanjing” de jing wen, shi yi bu mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [de jing wen],
shi dui xinshimen de yindao he jiayin.
Tamen [xinshi] jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, quexin houshi [zhu].
Zhiyu bu xinyang houshi zhe, wo yi tamen de xingwei fenshi tamen, yin'er tamen paihuai mangcong.
[Zai jinshi], zhexie ren bi zao yanxing; zai houshi, tamen que shi zui sunshi zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] que yi shou ci cong zui ruizhi de, quanzhi de zhu jiang shi de “gulanjing”.

Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de jiaren shuo:“Wo que yi kanjian [yuan chu you] yige huoguang, wo jiang cong nali gei nimen dai hui yixie xiaoxi lai, huo gei nimen dai hui yige ranshaozhe de huoba lai, yi gong nimen qunuan.”
Dang ta daoda huoguang chu shi, you shengyin han dao:“Zai huo fujin ji qi zhouwei de ren bei ci fule. Zanmei an la——zhong shijie de zhu chaojue!
Mu sa a! Zhe jiushi wo, shi an la, shi quanneng de zhu, shi zui ruizhi de zhu.

Ni reng xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na shouzhang xiang she yiyang wan yan yidong shi, ta jiu zhuanshen taoli er bu gan huigu.[An la shuo]:“Mu sa a! Ni buyao haipa, shizhemen zai wo zheli bubi haipa.
Dan xing bu yi hou gaiguo cong shan zhe chuwai. Wo que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Ni bashou charu huai zhong, ni chouchu shi jiang bian de jiebai yaoyan, meiyou renhe shanghai. Zhe [liang zhong jixiang] shi ni jiang xian gei falao he ta de renmin de jiu zhong jixiang de yibufen. Tamen que shi beini de minzhong.”
Dang wo de jixiang jianglin tamen shi, mingbai kejian, dan tamen queshuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
Suiran tamen de neixin quexin naxie jixiang [shi cong an la jiang shi de, mu sa shi an la de shizhe], dan tamen reng bu yi he aoman de jiayi fouren. Ni dang guancha zuo'e zhe de jieju ruhe!
Wo que yi ci gei da wude he su lai man zhishi. Ta lia shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, shi ta shi women you yu ta de xuduo xinyang de puren.”
Su lai man jichengle da wude [de zhishi]. Ta [da wude] shuo:“Renmen a! Women yi bei jiaoshou niao yu, women yi bei ciyu wanwu, zhe que shi [cong an la jiang shi de] mingxian de enhui.”
You jingling, renlei he niao lei zucheng de su lai man de jundui bei jihe dao ta mianqian, tamen pailie zhengqi [daiming chuzheng].
Dang tamen daoda mayi [zhu] gu shi, yi zhi [mu] mayi shuo:“Mayimen a! Nimen gankuai duo jin nimen de dong zhong qu ba! Yimian su lai man he ta de jundui zai bu zhi bu jue shi cai si nimen.”

Ta [su lai man] bei na zhi mayi dehua [zhu] douxiaole, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni guwu wo [bing ci wo liliang], yibian wo ganxie ni ci wo he wo fumu de enhui, yibian wo zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong. Qiu ni yi ni de enhui rang wo jinru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.”
Ta jianyue zhong niao bing shuo:“Wo zenme mei kanjian dai sheng niao ne? Ta [wugu] quexile ma?
Chufei ta gei wo dai lai yi xiang heli de yuanyin, fouze, wo yiding yao yancheng ta, huo sha si ta.”
Na zhi dai sheng niao tingliu bujiu jiu laile, ta [dui su lai man] shuo:“Wo zhidao [yi jian] ni suo bu zhidao de shi, wo cong sa ba gei ni dai laile yige kekao de xiaoxi.
Wo faxian you wei funu tongzhizhe ta de zuren. Ta yingyoujinyou, hai you yige xiongwei de baozuo.
Wo faxian ta he ta de zuren dou she an la er chongbai taiyang, emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, bing zuzhi tamen zou zhengdao, yin'er tamen wei zunxing zhengdao.
Yizhi tamen bu chongbai an la——na jieshi tiandi aomi de zhu. Fanshi nimen suo yincang de he gongkai de, ta [an la] quan zhidao.
An la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, ta shi weida baozuo [zhu] de zhu.” Koutou chu
